law.catch_line: Any lender who knowingly and willfully violates any provision of § 12-103, § 12-109.2, § 12-119, ...
law.text: Any lender who knowingly and willfully violates any provision of § 12-103, § 12-109.2, § 12-119, § 12-120, or § 12-121 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500, or imprisonment not exceeding 6 months, or both.
